availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, farmer. Native of Ireland. Married to Mary A. Carrigan. Father of Michael Carrigan, Julia Carrigan, William Carrigan, Mary A. Carrigan, and Edward Carrigan. Farmer in Bracken County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, District No. 1, p. 152.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, 8th District, p. 446B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Bracken County, KY, June and July 1863, p. 65 (Accessed via ancestry.com).
